subject: ASIA-PAC SERVICE IS NOW LIVE FOR TODAY'S SESSION
NEWSQUAWK CHRISTMAS PERIOD OPENING HOURS
content:
Business as usual up to 1845GMT Tuesday 24th December 2019

Closed for business 25th, 26th, 27th, 30th, 31st December 2019 and 1st January 2020

Normal service will resume at 0630GMT on Thursday 2nd of January 2020 for the beginning of the EU Session

Market closures and desk opening hours

 

24th December - Business as usual up to1845GMT Tuesday 24th December 2019

Floor Trade

1. CME/CBOT –FX and Interest Rates close at 1800GMT/1200CST, Equities Futures and Options close at 1815GMT/1215CST

2. NYSE – Early close at 1800GMT

Electronic Trade

1. CME – Equity, interest rates, FX close 1815GMT/1215CST, Energy closes at 1845GMT/1245CST

2. ICE – https://www.theice.com/holiday-hours

3. Eurex – Closed for trading in all derivatives

4. Euronext Derivatives – Instruments will begin closing at 1255GMT/0655CST

Cash Index:

1. FTSE – Close 1230GMT/0630CST onwards

2. Euronext Cash – All instruments will be closed by 1305GMT/0705CST

3. DAX - Closed

4. IBEX 35 – Close 1300GMT/0700CST

5. FTSE MIB - Close 1230GMT/0630CST onwards

6. SMI – Closed

7. Oslo Bors – Closed

8. OMX 30 – Closed

Asia-Pac

Australia – Close at 0330GMT/2110CST

Japan – Regular Hours

Hong Kong – Regular Hours

Floor Trade 

1. CME/CBOT - Closed

2. NYSE – Closed

1. CME Globex – Equity, interest rates, FX closed. Opens 2300GMT/1700CST

2. ICE https://www.theice.com/holiday-hours

subject: ASIA-PAC SERVICE HAS NOW FINISHED, PLEASE REVERT BACK TO YOUR ORIGINAL CHANNEL FOR COVERAGE ON THE UK & EUROPEAN SESSION
